trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around October 15th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsfirst, i had gone outside to get the mail after dinner and noticed a very bright shining star that i had never seen so low before, so i was looking at it and before i went inside i looked up again at it except it had moved...so i just stared at it and it was indeed moving ever so slowly, i couldn't take my eyes off it, next thing you know it got surrounded more and more by a fog and then disappeared. i went inside then about 45 minutes later i came back out trying to catch something again, all i noticed was another star that had been shining bright but i don't think it was in the same place, this one too was moving but even slower, i got it on my camera, and it is so pretty, i wish my camera could zoom more, b\c it twinkles blue, and some other colors, i really wish it had been closer...me and my stepson got in the car to go to the park in the neighborhood but by the time we got there, clouds had covered the area :(
Summary: VERY BRIGHT, BLINKING, SLOW MOVING STAR
